tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One of the impatient doctor ever met in my life. So much of negativity, rudeness and impatience. **** ****** ***** ********* ****** I consulted her for my first pregnancy confirmation, the way she gave her consultation was horrible. She was not even ready to listen to me, prescribed progesterone tablet and told me to take picture in case of pregnancy loss. She thinks she has more experience so the patient need not have to ask her something or even talk a few words. I never ever recommend this doctor to anyone. First of all when a patient visit the doctor all he/she expects is hope, few positive words and good consultation. * **** ** ********** ***** * ********* **** It is really good if the doctor shows some empathy.

Thank U Mam.

review: Doctor was polite and the way she collects information was really appreciated.will recommended this doctor in case if girls face any issues

Treated us like student and teacher manner. Seat far, don't close the door. 

Didn't explain clearly what is the issue. Only preference is for testing and scanning.
reply_text:
CIVID appropriate behavior has to be followed, inspite of being vaccinated we will be carrying the virus and spreading to each other.

Person who is a known case of PCOD on hormone pills from a long time, there is nothing much to do. PCO ladies will have irregular cycles or there will be delay in conceiving. So with the help of tests and scanning, we optimize the health that is, thyroid status, hemoglobin, blood sugars are checked regularly and corrected. If cycles are irregular then corrected with hormone pills. It's not a serious problem.

Same thing was explained and carried out

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: We actually went for pregnancy test but she didn't even came  close to patient and check on the condition. It was just a verbal talk what she had. And directly written ultra sound test. And in the file provided she has written tablet name for consume. How can she write tablet name before ultra sound test. I seriously don't recommend this lady. It's total money loss for Middle class people
reply_text:
Hi, folic acid tablet has to be started atleast 1 month before trying for pregnancy,  only then it can prevent pregnancy loss or protect the baby from some of the deformities. But most of the times, it is not started and the moment we see the patient, we start the tablets. It doesn't require ultrasound to be done before starting the tablets as the tablets are started even before trying for Pregnancy. 
Till 12 weeks of pregnancy, we don't feel anything on examination, only ultrasound will show  us about pregnancy details.
We are still in the phase of COVID pandemic,  covid appropriate behavior has to be followed for the safety of all of us. 
All pregnancies are taken care of with utmost love and care. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: For scanning and blood report we paid 7k, after that report checking purpose asking Rs.500/-. Its very bad.
reply_text:
At 12 weeks of pregnancy, we do all the blood and urine tests, NT SCAN, double marker test. So that if any treatment is required, it can be started early and that is the best way of taking care of pregnancy. 
Also, as we are still in the period of COVID pandemic, we keep the number of hospital visits to minimum visits. 
Hence, it would have cost you so much. 
Any hospital protocol is that there will be 1 free visit within 5 days of the 1st visit, after that consultation fees has to be paid.
